stories.name: Village Women
stories.text: A group of women in a small village had a home business but no documents to sell online. Khulega.online helped them â€” got their documents ready and onboarded them on Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho and more.

stories.name: Ramesh â€” Makhana Seller
stories.text: Ramesh used to sell Makhana from his village, only in the local market. With Khulega.online's help, he and his old friends now sell Makhana online across India.

stories.name: Local Artisan
stories.text: From local market to national reach â€” Khulega.online helped artisans get online and reach customers everywhere.
